label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_019
content:
## 2026-01-21 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /dns-query: REQUESTS 23500 req | p50: 20ms p95: 55ms p99: N/A | err: 0.3% (70 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS 285 req | p50: 690ms p95: 1735ms p99: N/A | err: 4.3% (12 errors) | success: 95.7%
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /health-check: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /config-change: REQUESTS 8 req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: 12.5% (1 error) | success: 87.5%
- /cache-status: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 47% | Mem 69% | Disk 78% | Conns: 1450 | Net: 118/160 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 35% | Mem 60% | Disk 58% | Conns: 1322 | Net: 98/112 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 72% | Mem 81% | Disk 54% | Conns: N/A | Net: 150/190 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 55% | Mem 82% | Disk 64% | Conns: N/A | Net: 24/29 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-axfr: active 47 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 50 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-ixfr: active 238 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 250 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-ttl: active 10 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 15 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-propagation: active 36 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 40 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-signing: active 4 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 5 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-queries: active 23500 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 30000 | avg_wait 0ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 86.8% | Bandwidth: 2.3 Gbps | Origin requests: 58000

### Alerts
- [SEVERE] lame delegation on hostname: 1
- [WARNING] SOA serial mismatch count: 3
- [ERROR] DNSSEC bogus validation events: 4
- [CRITICAL] TTL rollback occurred on zone: 1
- [ERROR] NS record missing in child zone delegation
- [WARNING] zonefile lint errors: 7
- [WARNING] dnssec policy violations: 1

### Deployments & Changes
- Migrated 16 zones during peak query period; observed temporary increase in transfer latency and propagation p95; rescheduled remaining migrations to off-peak.
- One change failed due to missing NS record in child zone delegation; corrected hierarchy and re-applied pipeline.
- Performed targeted TTL reduction (1800->120) for incident response readiness on 10 zones; rolled back one zone with strict vendor requirements.

### Events
- Migrated 16 zones during peak query period; observed temporary increase in transfer latency and propagation p95; rescheduled remaining migrations to off-peak.
- One change failed due to missing NS record in child zone delegation; corrected hierarchy and re-applied pipeline.
- Lame delegation alert triggered for one subzone after partial registrar update; validated glue and completed registrar correction.
- Performed targeted TTL reduction (1800->120) for incident response readiness on 10 zones; rolled back one zone with strict vendor requirements.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: B. Fischer. 4 pages. 9 tickets. Status: Elevated activity during peak migration; stabilized by rescheduling and fixing delegation gaps.
